1.title: Bunny Gets the Job

episode of.title: A Merry Christmas with Bunny the Elf (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

1.plot: It's Thanksgiving and Bunny has finally got a job. She is really, and I mean really, really excited about it.

2.title: Tips for Elfing

episode of.title: A Merry Christmas with Bunny the Elf (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

2.plot: Bunny has some great tips for all those elves out there elfing on Black Friday.

3.title: Elf Problems

episode of.title: A Merry Christmas with Bunny the Elf (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

3.plot: Bunny the Elf had a rough day on the job as a Christmas Elf and now Christmas is beginning to smell funky.

4.title: Elf Promotion and Transfer

episode of.title: A Merry Christmas with Bunny the Elf (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

4.plot: Bunny is thinking that she was made to be an elf. She is hoping for a promotion and job transfer to the North Pole but she isn't sure how to put in for a transfer.

5.title: Best Christmas Movies with Elves

episode of.title: A Merry Christmas with Bunny the Elf (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

5.plot: Bunny lists her top three (maybe it's five) Christmas Movies with Elves in them. Maybe someday she can work at the North Pole.

6.title: The Best Elf

episode of.title: A Merry Christmas with Bunny the Elf (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

6.plot: Bunny is just trying to be the best elf she can be but making toys may not be her thing.

7.title: Elevator Elf

episode of.title: A Merry Christmas with Bunny the Elf (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

7.plot: Bunny has a story to tell about her day as an Elevator Elf. Pretty safe to say she'll be taking the stairs from now on!.

8.title: 12 Days of Elfing

episode of.title: A Merry Christmas with Bunny the Elf (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

8.plot: Aaaaand now we know why Bunny never got cast in a musical.

9.title: Elf Award

episode of.title: A Merry Christmas with Bunny the Elf (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

9.plot: Bunny accepts the Most Enthusiastic Elf Award and has fond memories of elfing about.

10.title: Drunk Elf

episode of.title: A Merry Christmas with Bunny the Elf (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

10.plot: Bunny enjoyed her holiday party with the other elves and continues her celebration at home. Don't worry, she's still on the nice list.

imdb.plot outline: After spending years auditioning for musical theater and getting nowhere, the charming and optimistic Bunny gets a "real job" as a Christmas Elf at a Toy Store in Southern California. She keeps a vlog of her comical adventures as she sincerely hopes to get promoted to the North Pole.
imdb.title: A Merry Christmas with Bunny the Elf
akas: A Merry Christmas with Bunny the Elf (United States)
plot: After spending years auditioning for musical theater and getting nowhere, the charming and optimistic Bunny gets a "real job" as a Christmas Elf at a Toy Store in Southern California. She keeps a vlog of her comical adventures as she sincerely hopes to get promoted to the North Pole.::Jeremy Travis
